bw_netbyte Union Reference

We need these unions because of strange things that happen with different compilers when you try to treat, for example, floats as uint32&'s during (de)streaming operations. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

uint8 u8
int8 i8
char c
unsigned char uc
bool b

Detailed Description

We need these unions because of strange things that happen with different compilers when you try to treat, for example, floats as uint32&'s during (de)streaming operations.
